TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Base64 extends System.Object
public ref class Base64 abstract sealed

summary.span: 在二进制数据和以 base 64 表示的 UTF-8 编码的文本之间转换。

span.span: Converts between binary data and UTF-8 encoded text that is represented in base 64.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Buffers.OperationStatus DecodeFromUtf8 (ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8, Span<byte> bytes, out int bytesConsumed, out int bytesWritten, bool isFinalBlock = true);

static member DecodeFromUtf8 : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * Span<byte> * * * bool -> System.Buffers.OperationStatus

param.name: utf8
param.span: 包含需要解码的以 base 64 表示的 UTF-8 编码文本的输入范围。

span.span: The input span that contains UTF-8 encoded text in base 64 that needs to be decoded.

param.name: bytes
param.span: 包含操作结果（即解码的二进制数据）的输出范围。

span.span: The output span that contains the result of the operation, that is, the decoded binary data.

param.name: bytesConsumed
param.span: 在操作期间使用的输入字节数。

span.span: The number of input bytes consumed during the operation.

param.span: 如有必要，这可用于划分输入以供后续调用。

span.span: This can be used to slice the input for subsequent calls, if necessary.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.span: 写入输出范围的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes written into the output span.

param.span: 如有必要，这可用于划分输出以供后续调用。

span.span: This can be used to slice the output for subsequent calls, if necessary.

param.name: isFinalBlock
param.span: 如果输入范围包含要解码的整个数据，则为 （默认值）。

span.span: (default) if the input span contains the entire data to decode.

param.span: 如果输入范围包含部分数据且将输入更多数据，则为 。

span.span: if the input span contains partial data with more data to follow.

summary.span: 将表示为 base 64 的 UTF-8 编码的文本范围解码为二进制数据。

span.span: Decodes the span of UTF-8 encoded text represented as base 64 into binary data.

summary.span: 如果输入不是 4 的倍数，则它将尽可能多地解码，直到最接近 4 的倍数。

span.span: If the input is not a multiple of 4, it will decode as much as it can, to the closest multiple of 4.

returns.span: 用于指示解码操作状态的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the status of the decoding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可以按如下所示：The return value can be as follows: - ：已成功处理的整个输入范围。: Processing of the entire input span succeeded. - ：要写入已解码的输入的输出范围中没有足够的空间。: There is not enough space in the output span to write the decoded input. - :`isFinalBlock`是`false`和输入不是 4 的倍数。: `isFinalBlock` is `false` and the input is not a multiple of 4. 否则，视为部分输入。Otherwise, the partial input is considered . - ：输入包含在预期的基 64 范围之外的字节数、 具有无效或两个以上的填充字符，或不完整 (即，不 4 的倍数） 和`isFinalBlock`是`true`。: The input contains bytes outside of the expected base 64 range, has invalid or more than two padding characters, or is incomplete (that is, not a multiple of 4) and `isFinalBlock` is `true`.

Public Shared Function DecodeFromUtf8InPlace (buffer As Span(Of Byte), ByRef bytesWritten As Integer) As OperationStatus
public: static System::Buffers::OperationStatus DecodeFromUtf8InPlace(Span<System::Byte> buffer, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bytesWritten);
static member DecodeFromUtf8InPlace : Span<byte> * -> System.Buffers.OperationStatus

param.name: buffer
param.span: 包含需要解码的 base-64 文本数据的输入范围。

span.span: The input span that contains the base-64 text data that needs to be decoded.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.span: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes written into the buffer.

summary.span: 将以 base 64（就地）表示的 UTF-8 编码的文本范围解码为二进制数据。

span.span: Decodes the span of UTF-8 encoded text in base 64 (in-place) into binary data.

summary.span: 解码的二进制输出小于包含在输入中的文本数据（操作会压缩数据）。

span.span: The decoded binary output is smaller than the text data contained in the input (the operation deflates the data).

summary.span: 如果输入不是 4 的倍数，该方法将无法解码任何数据。

span.span: If the input is not a multiple of 4, the method will not decode any data.

returns.span: 用于指示解码操作状态的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the status of the decoding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可以按如下所示：The return value can be as follows: - ：已成功处理的整个输入范围。: Processing of the entire input span succeeded. - ：输入包含在预期的基 64 范围之外的字节数、 具有无效或两个以上的填充字符，或不完整 (即，不 4 的倍数）。: The input contains bytes outside of the expected base 64 range, has invalid or more than two padding characters, or is incomplete (that is, not a multiple of 4). 此方法不能返回和值。This method cannot return the and values.

span.span: The input span that contains binary data that needs to be encoded.

param.name: utf8
param.span: 包含操作结果（即以 base 64 表示的 UTF-8 编码的文本）的输出范围。

span.span: The output span that contains the result of the operation, that is, the UTF-8 encoded text in base 64.

param.name: bytesConsumed
param.span: 在操作期间使用的输入字节数。

span.span: The number of input bytes consumed during the operation.

param.span: 如有必要，这可用于划分输入以供后续调用。

span.span: This can be used to slice the input for subsequent calls, if necessary.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.span: 写入输出范围的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes written into the output span.

param.span: 如有必要，这可用于划分输出以供后续调用。

span.span: This can be used to slice the output for subsequent calls, if necessary.

param.name: isFinalBlock
param.span: 如果输入范围包含要编码的整个数据，则为 （默认值）。

span.span: (the default) if the input span contains the entire data to encode.

param.span: 如果输入范围包含部分数据且将输入更多数据，则为 。

span.span: if the input span contains partial data with more data to follow.

summary.span: 将二进制数据的范围编码为以 base 64 表示的 UTF-8 编码的文本。

span.span: Encodes the span of binary data into UTF-8 encoded text represented as base 64.

returns.span: 用于指示编码操作状态的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the status of the encoding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可以按如下所示：The return value can be as follows: - ：已成功处理的整个输入范围。: Processing of the entire input span succeeded. - ：在输出跨度以适应编码的输入中没有足够的空间。: There isn't enough space in the output span to fit the encoded input. - :`isFinalBlock`是`false`。: `isFinalBlock` is `false`. 否则为如果`isFinalBlock`是`true`，填充输出，如果输入不是 3 的倍数。Otherwise, if `isFinalBlock` is `true`, the output is padded if the input is not a multiple of 3. 此方法不能返回由于这是不可能的 base-64 编码。This method cannot return since that is not possible for base-64 encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Buffers.OperationStatus EncodeToUtf8InPlace (Span<byte> buffer, int dataLength, out int bytesWritten);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Buffers.OperationStatus EncodeToUtf8InPlace(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> buffer, int32 dataLength, [out] int32& bytesWritten) cil managed
Public Shared Function EncodeToUtf8InPlace (buffer As Span(Of Byte), dataLength As Integer, ByRef bytesWritten As Integer) As OperationStatus
public: static System::Buffers::OperationStatus EncodeToUtf8InPlace(Span<System::Byte> buffer, int dataLength, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bytesWritten);
static member EncodeToUtf8InPlace : Span<byte> * int * -> System.Buffers.OperationStatus

param.name: buffer
param.span: 包含需要编码的二进制数据的输入范围。

span.span: The input span that contains binary data that needs to be encoded.

param.span: 由于此方法执行就地转换，因此它需要具有足够大小来存储操作结果。

span.span: Because the method performs an in-place conversion, it needs to be large enough to store the result of the operation.

param.name: dataLength
param.span: 包含在需要编码的缓冲区内的二进制数据的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes of binary data contained within the buffer that needs to be encoded.

param.span: 此值必须小于缓冲区长度。

span.span: This value must be smaller than the buffer length.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.span: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes written into the buffer.

summary.span: 将二进制数据（就地）的范围编码为以 base 64 表示的 UTF-8 编码的文本。

span.span: Encodes the span of binary data (in-place) into UTF-8 encoded text represented as base 64.

summary.span: 编码的文本输出大于包含在输入中的二进制数据（操作会扩大数据）。

span.span: The encoded text output is larger than the binary data contained in the input (the operation inflates the data).

returns.span: 用于指示编码操作状态的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the status of the encoding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可以按如下所示：The return value can be as follows: - ：已成功处理整个缓冲区。: Processing of the entire buffer succeeded. - ：超出缓冲区中没有足够的空间`dataLength`以适应编码输入的结果。: There isn't enough space in the buffer beyond `dataLength` to fit the result of encoding the input. 此方法不能返回和。This method cannot return and .

is less than 0.

exception.span: 小于 0 或大于 1610612733（因为编码将数据扩大了 4/3）。

span.span: is less than 0 or larger than 1610612733 (since encode inflates the data by 4/3).
